channel.title: starting on Jerry Caligiure
channel.description: Recent content in starting on Jerry Caligiure

item.title: TOMARS
item.description: I’ve had an idea for decades now bouncing around in my head. I loved everything put out on MS Paint Adventures, from Bard’s tale to Homestuck. I liked the idea of readers having an influence on what happens next in the story; that the author would have to adjust and adapt the story based on the user input. Kinda like a real-time democratic choose your own adventure book. I want to make something like that, but inside a video game.
